summary: REQ-19 game-core updates appear largely implemented (game phases, awaiting-confirmation vs game-over behavior, winner/turns tracking, and bust handling). REQ-21 Game Over screen and rematch/new game actions are implemented. REQ-20 confirmation prompt is present, but the modal text/actions may not meet the “exact text”/YES-NO wording, and it’s not fully evidenced that score entry is blocked while awaiting confirmation due to truncation in GamePage.tsx.

missing_requirements.requirement: When awaiting confirmation, the UI shows a prompt/modal containing exactly: "Was it a double finish?"
missing_requirements.reason: The modal includes additional user-facing title text (“Double Finish Confirmation”), so the prompt content is not limited to exactly the required string.

missing_requirements.requirement: The prompt must provide two actions: YES and NO (as labeled actions).
While awaiting confirmation, prevent further score entry from being applied until the user chooses YES or NO.
missing_requirements.reason: Although Keypad gained a `disabled` prop, the provided/truncated GamePage diff does not show wiring that disables score entry/submission while `game.phase === 'awaiting-confirmation'` (render section is truncated).

hallucinated_features.description: Modal adds an extra title "Double Finish Confirmation" above the required confirmation question.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only specifies showing a prompt/modal with the exact text "Was it a double finish?" and does not request an additional title.

hallucinated_features.description: Game Over screen includes a trophy icon and additional congratulatory text (e.g., "Congratulations to the winner").
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requires displaying winner name and turns plus Rematch/New Game buttons; icons and extra congratulatory copy were not explicitly requested.
